snippet.title: Fruit Ninja Kinect 2 - Gameplay Trailer!
snippet.description:
Bigger! Better! Juicier gameplay! Fruit Ninja Kinect 2 OUT NOW on Xbox One! 

Fruit Ninja Kinect 2 is here at last! Excited? We are too. That's why we're giving away 4 Xbox One prize packs to the most creative Fruit Ninja players in the world! Check out the #ninjastyle trailer to find out how! https://youtu.be/yHnrba0xuSA

TO ENTER: 
1. Record a short video of up to 30 seconds which shows your ultimate #NINJASTYLE
2. Upload your video to YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or Vine (make sure it's public!)
3. Include #NINJASTYLE and "Fruit Ninja Kinect 2" in all titles, captions, and video descriptions
4. (Optional) Tweet your entry to @halfbrick or @fruitninja so we can admire your handiwork

May the best ninja win!

DOWNLOAD FNK2: http://bit.ly/fnk-2
CONTEST DETAILS: http://fruitninja.com/giveaway
OFFICIAL RULES: http://bit.ly/1H1ehU6
